name: commands_changed
desc: A slash command has been added or changed.
long_desc: My Slack API Start herenew App features Messaging Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Resources Community A slash command has been added or changed Compatibility:Â RTM The commands_changed event is sent to all connections for a workspace when a slash command for that workspace is added, removed or changed. This functionality is only used by our web client. The other APIs required to support slash command metadata are currently unstable. Until they are released other clients should ignore this event.
